name: Gravitek Racing
description:
Gravitek Racing is a futuristic racing game where we've been liberated from the chains that binded us to the ground. Now we are free to create new ways of racing.

In an era where technology has suprassed the laws of physics, races have changed, and those in search for speed converge into the biggest and most dangerous competition of all times, the Magna-Zero.

Racing tracks are magnetized and vehicles are now able to boost and jump into the air, opening all sorts of possibilities for pilots to achieve faster times.

This game is a proof of concept. Currently it has:

  • Three different tracks
  • Three opponent difficulties to compete with
  • Keyboard / Controller support
  • No vehicle customization, unlockables or progression so far.

Created by Raúl Vera Ortega.
